page.title: 08CUTTHORPE VILLAGE - 2
page.content: The road has a weight restriction of {7.5 TONNES}for lorries, speed limit of 40 miles per hour and a small amount of{street lighting }Every year there is {Well Dressing }of two wells thanking God for the water. {Cutthorpe is 1 of only 2 villages using{whole {flower heads only.}There is a{Charity {Committee }raising funds for the Village and also for the disabled. Every year they have a{Gala day}to {raise money.}There is a{Village Hall} recently restored by the{Parish {Council}and run by a committee of villagers.There is a famous field of daffodils{'Van Zion'}planted by{ {Gilbert Heathcote }about{1690,}with many rare flowers and birds including{ {Great Spotted & Green Woodpeckers.} There is a{Caravan Club}at the{Peacock {Inn.}The Church is at{Old Brampton } five miles away by road.
